trans-unit.target: 服务人员的概念和用法

trans-unit.source: Service workers
trans-unit.target: 服务人员

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 and 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 45和52扩展支持版本（ESR）中，服务工作者（和Push）已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 and 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR.)
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 45和52扩展支持版本（ESR。）中，服务工作者（和Push）已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 & 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 45和52扩展支持版本（ESR）中，服务工作者（和Push）已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 & 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR.)

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 & 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR).

trans-unit.source: Service workers (and Push) have been disabled in the Firefox 45 and 52 Extended Support Releases (ESR).

trans-unit.source: Service workers are also intended to be used for such things as:
trans-unit.target: 服务人员的目的也是为了这样的事情。

trans-unit.source: Service workers basic code example
trans-unit.target: 服务人员基本代码示例

trans-unit.source: Service workers demo
trans-unit.target: 服务人员演示

trans-unit.source: Service workers essentially act as proxy servers that sit between web applications, the browser, and the network (when available). They are intended, among other things, to enable the creation of effective offline experiences, intercept network requests and take appropriate action based on whether the network is available, and update assets residing on the server. They will also allow access to push notifications and background sync APIs.
trans-unit.target: 服务人员基本上是作为代理服务器,位于网络应用、浏览器和网络(可用时)之间。除其他外,它们的目的是实现有效的离线体验,拦截网络请求并根据网络是否可用采取适当行动,以及更新服务器上的资产。它们还将允许访问推送通知和后台同步API。

trans-unit.source: Service workers only run over HTTPS, for security reasons. Having modified network requests, wide open to man in the middle attacks would be really bad. In Firefox, Service Worker APIs are also hidden and cannot be used when the user is in private browsing mode.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，服务工作者仅在HTTPS上运行。修改了网络请求后，中间攻击者大开眼界确实很不好。在Firefox中，当用户处于私有浏览模式时，Service Worker API也会被隐藏并且无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Service workers should finally fix these issues. Service worker syntax is more complex than that of AppCache, but the trade off is that you can use JavaScript to control your AppCache-implied behaviours with a fine degree of granularity, allowing you to handle this problem and many more. Using a Service worker you can easily set an app up to use cached assets first, thus providing a default experience even when offline, before then getting more data from the network (commonly known as Offline First). This is already available with native apps, which is one of the main reasons native apps are often chosen over web apps.
trans-unit.target: 服务人员应最终解决这些问题。服务工作者的语法比AppCache的语法更复杂，但是需要权衡的是，您可以使用JavaScript以细粒度的方式控制AppCache所隐含的行为，从而使您可以处理此问题以及更多其他问题。使用Service Worker，您可以轻松地将应用程序设置为首先使用缓存的资产，从而即使在脱机时也可以提供默认体验，然后再从网络获取更多数据（通常称为Offline First）。本机应用程序已经提供了此功能，这是本机应用程序通常是通过Web应用程序选择的主要原因之一。

trans-unit.source: Set
trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Set MediaRecorder.ondataavailable to an event handler for the dataavailable event; this will be called whenever data is available for you.
trans-unit.target: 将 MediaRecorder.ondataavailable 设置为 dataavailable 事件的事件处理程序；只要有可用数据，就会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Set MediaRecorder.state to "paused".
trans-unit.target: 将 MediaRecorder.state 设置为“已暂停”。

trans-unit.source: Set MediaRecorder.state to "recording".
trans-unit.target: 将 MediaRecorder.state 设置为“ recording”。

trans-unit.source: Set myPeerConnection to null, ensuring our code learns there's no ongoing call; this is useful when the user clicks a name in the user list.
trans-unit.target: 将 myPeerConnection 设置为 null ，确保我们的代码得知没有正在进行的调用；当用户单击用户列表中的名称时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Set onaddtrack to a function that accepts as input a TrackEvent object which indicates in its track property which audio track has been added to the media.
trans-unit.target: 将 onaddtrack 设置为接受 TrackEvent 对象作为输入的函数，该对象在其 track 属性中指示已将哪个音频轨道添加到媒体。

trans-unit.source: Set onaddtrack to a function that accepts as input a TrackEvent object which indicates in its track property which video track has been added to the media.
trans-unit.target: 将 onaddtrack 设置为接受 TrackEvent 对象作为输入的函数，该对象在其 track 属性中指示已将哪个视频轨道添加到媒体。

trans-unit.source: Set onchange to a function that should be called whenever a track is made active.
trans-unit.target: 将 onchange 设置为每当激活轨道时应调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: Set onchange to a function that should be called whenever tracks are enabled or disabled on the media element.
trans-unit.target: 将 onchange 设置为在媒体元素上启用或禁用轨道时应调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: Set onremovetrack to a function that accepts as input a TrackEvent object which indicates in its track property which audio track has been removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 将 onremovetrack 设置为接受 TrackEvent 对象作为输入的函数，该对象在其 track 属性中指示从媒体元素中删除了哪个音轨。

trans-unit.source: Set onremovetrack to a function that accepts as input a TrackEvent object which indicates in its track property which video track has been removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 将 onremovetrack 设置为接受 TrackEvent 对象作为输入的函数，该对象在其 track 属性中指示从媒体元素中删除了哪个视频轨道。

trans-unit.source: Set ontrack to be a function you provide that accepts as input a RTCTrackEvent object describing the new track and how it's being used. This information includes the MediaStreamTrack object representing the new track, the RTCRtpReceiver and RTCRtpTransceiver, and a list of MediaStream objects which indicates which stream or streams the track is part of..
trans-unit.target: 将 ontrack 设置为您提供的函数，该函数接受描述新轨道及其使用方式的 RTCTrackEvent 对象作为输入。该信息包括代表新轨道的 MediaStreamTrack 对象， RTCRtpReceiver 和 RTCRtpTransceiver ，以及指示该轨道属于哪个流的 MediaStream 对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: Set a line width and stroke colour for the wave we will draw, then begin drawing a path
trans-unit.target: 为我们要绘制的波浪设置一个线宽和笔触颜色,然后开始绘制一个路径

trans-unit.source: Set the presentation connection state of S to connecting.
trans-unit.target: 设置演示连接状态的 S 来 connecting 。

trans-unit.source: Set the presentation identifier of S to presentationId.
trans-unit.target: 设置演示标识的 S 来 presentationId 。

trans-unit.source: Set the presentation URL of S to the presentation URL of E.
trans-unit.target: 在设置展示URL的 S 到展示URL的 E 。

trans-unit.source: Set the MediaRecorder.state to "inactive" and stop capturing media.
trans-unit.target: 将 MediaRecorder.state 设置为“非活动”并停止捕获媒体。

trans-unit.source: Set the draggable attribute to true on the element that you wish to make draggable.
trans-unit.target: 在希望使其可拖动的元素上将 draggable 属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Set the audio transceiver's direction property to "recvonly", instructing the transceiver to only accept audio and not to send any.
trans-unit.target: 将音频收发器的 direction 属性设置为 "recvonly" ，指示收发器仅接受音频而不发送任何音频。

trans-unit.source: Set the data for a given type. If data for the type does not exist, it is added at the end, such that the last item in the types list will be the new format. If data for the type already exists, the existing data is replaced in the same position.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定类型的数据,如果该类型的数据不存在,则在最后添加,这样类型列表中的最后一项将是新的格式。如果类型的数据不存在,则在最后添加,这样类型列表中的最后一项将是新的格式。如果类型的数据已经存在,则在相同的位置替换现有数据。

trans-unit.source: Set the image to be used for dragging if a custom one is desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要自定义图像,请设置用于拖动的图像。

trans-unit.source: Set the image's height to 60 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 将图像的高度设置为60像素。

trans-unit.source: Set the image's source to a new object URL representing the file, using window.URL.createObjectURL() to create the blob URL.
trans-unit.target: 使用 window.URL.createObjectURL() 创建图片URL，将图像的源设置为代表文件的新对象URL。

trans-unit.source: Set the oscillator's frequency to the desired value; in this case, oscNode1 is set to a middle C, while oscNode2 and oscNode3 round out the chord by playing the E and G notes.
trans-unit.target: 将振荡器的频率设置为所需的值；在这种情况下， oscNode1 设置为中间C，而 oscNode2 和 oscNode3 通过弹奏E和G音符使和弦变圆。

trans-unit.source: Set the oscillator's type to "sine" to use a sine wave as the audio waveform.
trans-unit.target: 将振荡器的类型设置为 "sine" 以使用正弦波作为音频波形。

trans-unit.source: Set the remote description to the specified offer by calling RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription().
trans-unit.target: 设置远程描述到指定的 offer 致电 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to be a function you provide which receives as input a single parameter: an RTCDataChannelEvent which provides in its channel property the RTCDataChannel which has been created.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为您提供的函数，该函数接收一个输入作为输入： RTCDataChannelEvent ，在其 channel 属性中提供已创建的 RTCDataChannel 。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to reference a function you provide that is called by the WebRTC layer when the RTCIceTransport object's state changes.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性以引用您提供的函数，当 RTCIceTransport 对象的 state 更改时，WebRTC层将调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: Set this to a function which you provide that receives an Event object as input; this contains the signalingstatechange event. This event object doesn't provide details about what changed, but you can examine the signalingState property to determine what the new state is.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为提供的函数，该函数接收 Event 对象作为输入；这包含 signalingstatechange 事件。该事件对象不提供有关更改内容的详细信息，但是您可以检查 signalingState 属性以确定新状态是什么。

trans-unit.source: Set to "frame".
trans-unit.target: 设置为“ frame ”。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to extend monitoring to the entire subtree of nodes rooted at target. All of the other MutationObserverInit properties are then extended to all of the nodes in the subtree instead of applying solely to the target node. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可将监视范围扩展到以 target 为根的节点的整个子树。然后，将所有其他 MutationObserverInit 属性扩展到子树中的所有节点，而不是仅应用于 target 节点。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to monitor the specified target node or subtree for changes to the character data contained within the node or nodes. No default value.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以监视指定的目标节点或子树以查看节点或节点中包含的字符数据的更改。无默认值。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to monitor the target node (and, if subtree is true, its descendants) for the addition or removal of new child nodes. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以监视目标节点（如果 subtree 为 true ，则监视其子节点）是否添加或删除新的子节点。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to record the previous value of a node's text whenever the text changes on nodes being monitored. For details and an example, see Monitoring text content changes in MutationObserver. No default value.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以在监视节点上的文本更改时记录该节点文本的先前值。有关详细信息和示例，请参见监控文本内容的变化在MutationObserver。无默认值。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to record the previous value of any attribute that changes when monitoring the node or nodes for attribute changes; see Monitoring attribute values in MutationObserver for details on watching for attribute changes and value recording. No default value.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 以记录在监视一个或多个节点的属性更改时更改的任何属性的先前值；有关监视属性更改和值记录的详细信息，请参见在MutationObserver中监视属性值。无默认值。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to watch for changes to the value of attributes on the node or nodes being monitored. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 以监视受监视的一个或多个节点上的属性值的更改。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Set to a timestamp indicating the difference between the startTimes of two successive frames.
trans-unit.target: 设置为一个 timestamp 指示两个连续帧的 startTime 之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Set to the DOMHighResTimeStamp when the frame was started.
trans-unit.target: 框架开始时设置为 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: Set to the document's address.
trans-unit.target: 设置为文档的地址。

trans-unit.source: Set up a MediaStream or HTMLMediaElement (in the form of an <audio> or <video> element) to serve as the source of the media data.
trans-unit.target: 设置 MediaStream 或 HTMLMediaElement （以 <audio> 或 <video> 元素的形式）以用作媒体数据的源。

trans-unit.source: Set up the ICE candidates
trans-unit.target: 设立ICE候选人

trans-unit.source: Set up the image's load event handler to release the object URL since it's no longer needed once the image has been loaded. This is done by calling the window.URL.revokeObjectURL() method and passing in the object URL string as specified by img.src.
trans-unit.target: 设置图像的加载事件处理程序以释放对象URL，因为一旦加载图像就不再需要它。这是通过调用 window.URL.revokeObjectURL() 方法并传入 img.src 指定的对象URL字符串来完成的。

trans-unit.source: Set up the local peer
trans-unit.target: 设置本地同行

trans-unit.target: 设置远程同行

trans-unit.source: SetElement
trans-unit.target: SetElement

trans-unit.source: Sets aBlock to <b></b> only, which is probably not what you want.
trans-unit.target: aBlock 将aBlock设置为 <b></b> ，这可能不是您想要的。

trans-unit.source: Sets a PeriodicWave which describes a periodic waveform to be used instead of one of the standard waveforms; calling this sets the type to custom. This replaces the now-obsolete OscillatorNode.setWaveTable() method.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个 PeriodicWave ，它描述了要使用的周期波形而不是标准波形之一；调用此方法会将 type 设置为 custom 。这将替换现在过时的 OscillatorNode.setWaveTable() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom validity message for the element. If this message is not the empty string, then the element is suffering from a custom validity error, and does not validate.
trans-unit.target: 为元素设置一个自定义的有效性消息。如果该消息不是空字符串,那么该元素就会出现自定义有效性错误,并且不会被验证。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom validity message for the field set. If this message is not the empty string, then the field set is suffering from a custom validity error, and does not validate.
trans-unit.target: 设置字段集的自定义有效性消息。如果该消息不是空字符串,那么字段集就会出现自定义有效性错误,并且不会生效。

trans-unit.source: Sets a delay for executing a function.
trans-unit.target: 设置执行函数的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag that specifies whether automatic log in is allowed for future visits to the current origin, then returns an empty Promise. For example, you might call this, after a user signs out of a website to ensure that he/she isn't automatically signed in on the next site visit. Earlier versions of the spec called this method requireUserMediation(). See Browser compatibility for support details.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个标志，该标志指定是否允许自动登录以供将来访问当前源时使用，然后返回一个空的 Promise 。例如，在用户退出网站以确保他/她在下次访问网站时不会自动登录之后，您可以调用此方法。规范的早期版本称为此方法 requireUserMediation() 。有关支持的详细信息，请参见浏览器兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new value for an existing header inside a Headers object, or adds the header if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 为 Headers 对象中现有的标头设置新值，或添加标头（如果尚不存在）。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new value for an existing key inside a FormData object, or adds the key/value if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 为 FormData 对象中的现有键设置新值，或者如果键/值尚不存在，则添加该键/值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a parameter
trans-unit.target: 设置一个参数

trans-unit.source: Sets a specific CSS property to the specified values and returns the first value as a CSSStyleValue object.
trans-unit.target: 将特定的CSS属性设置为指定的值，然后将第一个值作为 CSSStyleValue 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: Sets a window to minimized state (a way to undo it programatically is by calling window.moveTo()).
trans-unit.target: 将窗口设置为最小状态（以编程方式撤消该状态的方法是调用 window.moveTo() ）。

trans-unit.target: 将所有出现的特定CSS属性设置为指定的值，并返回一个 CSSStyleValue 对象数组，每个对象都包含提供的值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sets all pixels in the rectangle defined by starting point (x, y) and size (width, height) to transparent black, erasing any previously drawn content.
trans-unit.target: 将由起点（x，y）和大小（宽度，高度）定义的矩形中的所有像素设置为透明黑色，以擦除所有先前绘制的内容。

trans-unit.source: Sets an event handler for a media session action, such as play or pause. See the method page for a full list.
trans-unit.target: 为媒体会话操作(如播放或暂停)设置事件处理程序。完整的列表请参见方法页面。

trans-unit.source: Sets and returns a string containing the grammar from within in the SpeechGrammar object instance.
trans-unit.target: 从 SpeechGrammar 对象实例中设置并返回一个包含语法的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets and returns the weight of the SpeechGrammar object.
trans-unit.target: 设置并返回 SpeechGrammar 对象的权重。

trans-unit.source: Sets both the RGB blend equation and alpha blend equation to a single equation.
trans-unit.target: 将RGB混合方程和alpha混合方程都设置为一个方程。

trans-unit.target: 设置正面和背面的钢网测试动作。

trans-unit.target: 设置如何在选取框内滚动文本。可能的值为 scroll ， slide 和 alternate 。如果未指定任何值，则默认值为 scroll 。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the current inversed transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取当前的反向变换矩阵。

trans-unit.target: 设置或获取当前转换矩阵，请参见 CanvasRenderingContext2D.currentTransform 。

trans-unit.target: 设置或返回对 ShadowRoot 内部的DOM树的引用。

trans-unit.target: 设置中断结束时调用的 EventHandler 。这是特定于Firefox的，已为Firefox OS实现，并已在Firefox 55中删除。

trans-unit.target: 设置当由于音频通道管理器而中断媒体元素时调用的 EventHandler 。这是特定于Firefox的，已为Firefox OS实现，并已在Firefox 55中删除。

trans-unit.target: 设置在加密媒体时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.target: 将选择元素的自定义有效性消息设置为指定的消息。使用空字符串来表明该元素并不能有一个自定义的有效性的错误。

trans-unit.target: 将转换类型设置为 SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX ，并使用参数矩阵定义新的转换。请注意，将复制参数 matrix 中的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting the value of this property is equivalent to calling document.enableStyleSheetsForSet() with the value of currentStyleSheetSet, then setting the value of lastStyleSheetSet to that value as well.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property doesn't set the focus to the associated <select> element: it merely tells the browser to focus to it when the element is inserted in the document. Setting it after the insertion, that is most of the time after the document load, has no visible effect.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性不会将焦点设置到关联的 <select> 元素：它只是告诉浏览器将元素插入文档中时将焦点对准它。在插入后（即在文档加载后的大多数时间）进行设置不会产生可见效果。

trans-unit.source: Several interfaces are direct or indirect descendants of this one: MouseEvent, TouchEvent, FocusEvent, KeyboardEvent, WheelEvent, InputEvent, and CompositionEvent.

trans-unit.target: 还有几个基于 MouseEvent 的特定事件，包括 WheelEvent 和 DragEvent 。

trans-unit.source: Several of the Resource Timing properties return high-resolution timestamps. These timestamps have a DOMHighResTimeStamp type and as its name implies, they represent a high-resolution point in time. This type is a double and its value is a discrete point in time or the difference in time between two discrete points in time.
trans-unit.target: 一些 Resource Timing 属性返回高分辨率时间戳。这些时间戳具有 DOMHighResTimeStamp 类型，顾名思义，它们代表高分辨率的时间点。此类型是 double 类型，其值是离散时间点或两个离散时间点之间的时间差。

trans-unit.source: Several other interfaces are also extended by the CSSOM-related specifications: Document, Window, Element, HTMLElement, HTMLImageElement, Range, MouseEvent, and SVGElement.
trans-unit.target: CSSOM相关规范还扩展了其他几个接口： Document ， Window ， Element ， HTMLElement ， HTMLImageElement ， Range ， MouseEvent 和 SVGElement 。

trans-unit.source: Shared workers are workers that can be utilized by multiple scripts running in different windows, IFrames, etc., as long as they are in the same domain as the worker. They are a little more complex than dedicated workers — scripts must communicate via an active port. See SharedWorker for more details.
trans-unit.target: 共享工作程序是可以由在不同窗口，IFrame等中运行的多个脚本使用的工作程序，只要它们与该工作程序位于同一域中即可。它们比专门的工作人员稍微复杂一点-脚本必须通过活动端口进行通信。有关更多详细信息，请参见 SharedWorker 。

trans-unit.source: Signaling and video calling
trans-unit.target: 信号和视频通话

trans-unit.source: Signaling is the process of sending control information between two devices to determine the communication protocols, channels, media codecs and formats, and method of data transfer, as well as any required routing information. The most important thing to know about the signaling process for WebRTC: it is not defined in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 信令是在两个设备之间发送控制信息以确定通信协议，通道，媒体编解码器和格式以及数据传输方法以及任何所需路由信息的过程。关于WebRTC的信令过程要了解的最重要的事情：在规范中未定义。

trans-unit.target: 信号交易流程

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 标志着流的结束。

trans-unit.source: Signed 64-bit integer number.
trans-unit.target: 有符号的64位整数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to "alternate", except the animation playback starts by going from the end of the animation sequence toward the beginning the first iteration, then goes forward during the second, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 与 "交替 "类似,但动画播放的开始方式是在第一次迭代时从动画序列的末尾向开始,然后在第二次迭代时向前播放,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: Similar to "arraybuffer", but the data is received in a stream. When using this response type, the value in response is only available in the handler for the progress event, and only contains the data received since the last progress event, rather than the cumulative data received since the request was sent.
trans-unit.target: 与 "arraybuffer" 类似，但是数据是在流中接收的。当使用这种响应类型，在价值 response 只有在处理程序可用的 progress 情况，并且只包含自上次接收到的数据 progress 情况，而不是收到的累计数据，因为发送请求。

trans-unit.source: Similar to RGB8_ETC, but with ability to punch through the alpha channel, which means to make it completely opaque or transparent.

trans-unit.target: 自Firefox 55起，跟踪脚本（例如Google Analytics（分析），Firefox通过其TP列表将其识别为跟踪脚本的任何脚本URL ）都受到了进一步的限制。在前台运行时，节流最小延迟仍为4ms。但是，在后台选项卡中，限制的最小延迟为10000毫秒（即10秒），该延迟在首次加载文档30秒后生效。

trans-unit.source: Since RTP is simply a data transport, it is augmented by the closely-related RTP Control Protocol (RTCP), which is defined in RFC 3550, section 6. RTCP adds features including Quality of Service (QoS) monitoring, participant information sharing, and the like. It isn't adequate for the purposes of fully managing users, memberships, permissions, and so forth, but provides the basics needed for an unrestricted multi-user communication session.
trans-unit.target: 由于RTP仅仅是数据传输，因此它由紧密相关的RTP控制协议（RTCP）进行了增强，该协议在RFC 3550第6节中定义。RTCP添加了功能，包括服务质量（QoS）监视，参与者信息共享等。它不足以完全管理用户，成员资格，权限等，但是提供了无限制的多用户通信会话所需的基础。

trans-unit.source: Since a platform's system clock is subject to various skews (such as NTP adjustments), the interfaces support a monotonic clock i.e. a clock that is always increasing. As such, the Performance API defines a DOMHighResTimeStamp type rather than using the Date.now() interface.
trans-unit.target: 由于平台的系统时钟会受到各种偏差（例如NTP调整）的影响，因此接口支持单调时钟，即时钟始终在增加。这样， Performance API定义了 DOMHighResTimeStamp 类型，而不是使用 Date.now() 接口。

trans-unit.source: Since calling preventDefault() on a touchstart or the first touchmove event of a series prevents the corresponding mouse events from firing, it's common to call preventDefault() on touchmove rather than touchstart. That way, mouse events can still fire and things like links will continue to work. Alternatively, some frameworks have taken to refiring touch events as mouse events for this same purpose. (This example is oversimplified and may result in strange behavior. It is only intended as a guide.)
trans-unit.target: 由于在 touchstart 上调用 preventDefault() 或系列中的第一个 touchmove 事件可防止触发相应的鼠标事件，因此通常在 touchmove 上而不是 touchstart 上调用 preventDefault() 。这样，鼠标事件仍然可以触发，并且诸如链接之类的事情将继续起作用。替代地，出于相同的目的，一些框架已经将触摸事件作为鼠标事件来取消。 （此示例过于简化，可能会导致奇怪的行为。它仅供参考。）

trans-unit.source: Since the "name" index isn't unique, there might be multiple entries where name is the same. When nextunique or prevunique is used, the entry with the lowest key is always the one returned.

trans-unit.source: Since there is a one-to-one pairing of ID with each source, all tracks with the same source will share the same ID for any given origin, so MediaStreamTrack.getCapabilities() will always return exactly one value for deviceId. That makes the device ID not useful for any changes to constraints when calling MediaStreamTrack.applyConstraints().

trans-unit.source: So caches.match(event.request) is great when there is a match in the service worker cache, but what about cases when there isn’t a match? If we didn’t provide any kind of failure handling, our promise would resolve with undefined and we wouldn't get anything returned.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当service worker缓存中存在匹配项时， caches.match(event.request) 很好，但是如果没有匹配项，情况又如何呢？如果我们不提供任何类型的故障处理，我们的承诺将以 undefined 方式解决，并且我们将不会得到任何回报。

trans-unit.source: So every update, the raycaster looks to see if you've pressed any keys lately, to conserve calculations by not casting if you're idle. If you have, then the canvas is cleared, the ground and sky are drawn, the camera position and/or orientation are updated, and the rays are cast out. As the rays intersect walls, then they render a vertical sliver of canvas in the color of the wall they've hit, blended with a darker version of the color according to the distance to the wall. The height of the sliver is also modulated by the distance from the camera to the wall, and is drawn centered over the horizon line.
trans-unit.target: 所以每次更新时,光线投射器都会查看你最近是否按过键,如果你闲置,就不投射,以节省计算时间。如果你按了,那么画布会被清除,地面和天空会被绘制,摄像机的位置和/或方向会被更新,射线会被投射出去。当光线与墙壁相交时,那么它们就会在画布上呈现出一个垂直的细条,其颜色为它们所撞到的墙壁的颜色,并根据与墙壁的距离与较暗版本的颜色混合。这条画条的高度也会根据摄像机到墙面的距离进行调节,并以地平线为中心绘制。

trans-unit.source: So far this is pretty similar to what we've done in previous sections. However once we call the first restore() statement, the top drawing state is removed from the stack, and settings are restored. If we hadn't saved the state using save(), we would need to change the fill color and transparency manually in order to return to the previous state. This would be easy for two properties, but if we have more than that, our code would become very long, very fast.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，这与我们在前几节中所做的非常相似。但是，一旦我们调用第一个 restore() 语句，就会从堆栈中删除顶部的绘图状态，并还原设置。如果未使用 save() 保存状态，则需要手动更改填充颜色和透明度，以返回到先前的状态。这对于两个属性来说很容易，但是如果我们拥有更多的属性，我们的代码将变得非常长，非常快。

trans-unit.source: So far, each example on this page has used only one type of path function per shape. However, there's no limitation to the number or types of paths you can use to create a shape. trans-unit.target: 到目前为止,这个页面上的每个例子都只使用了一种类型的路径函数。然而,您可以使用路径的数量或类型来创建一个形状,并没有限制。所以在最后一个例子中,让我们结合所有的路径函数来制作一组非常著名的游戏角色。

trans-unit.source: So if the Key was "dGhlIHNhbXBsZSBub25jZQ==", the Accept will be "s3pPLMBiTxaQ9kYGzzhZRbK+xOo=". Once the server sends these headers, the handshake is complete and you can start swapping data!
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果密钥为“ dGhlIHNhbXBsZSBub25jZQ== ”，则接受将为“ s3pPLMBiTxaQ9kYGzzhZRbK+xOo= ”。服务器发送完这些标头后，握手完成，您可以开始交换数据了！

trans-unit.source: So if your hard drive is 500 GB, then the total storage for a browser is 250 GB. If this is exceeded, a process called origin eviction comes into play, deleting an entire origin's worth of data until the storage amount goes under the limit again. There is no trimming effect put in place to delete parts of origins — deleting one database of an origin could cause problems with inconsistency.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您的硬盘驱动器为500 GB，那么浏览器的总存储空间为250 GB。如果超过了此限制，则将执行一个称为“ 原点逐出”的过程，删除整个原点的数据，直到存储量再次低于限制。没有删除原始部分的修剪效果–删除一个原始数据库可能会导致不一致的问题。

trans-unit.source: So let's begin! The BaseAudioContext (the interface the AudioContext is extended from) has a listener property that returns an AudioListener object. The pannerNode can then calculate its sound position relative to the position of the listener.
trans-unit.target: 让我们开始吧！所述 BaseAudioContext （该接口 AudioContext 从延伸）具有 listener 属性，返回一个 AudioListener 对象。这代表场景的听众，通常是您的用户。您可以定义它们在空间中的位置以及面向的方向。它们保持静态。然后， pannerNode 可以计算其相对于侦听器位置的声音位置。

trans-unit.source: So what's new? Virtual Reality hardware needs to deliver high-precision, low-latency data to deliver an acceptable user experience; computers running VR applications need to be powerful enough to handle all this information. It has not been until recently that such accuracy and power has been available at an afforable cost, if at all. Early VR prototypes cost tens of thousands of dollars, whereas more recent headsets such as the HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift are available for hundreds of dollars, and cheaper solutions are available — mobile device-based solutions like Gear VR and Google Cardboard.
trans-unit.target: 那么有什么新消息？虚拟现实硬件需要提供高精度，低延迟的数据，以提供可接受的用户体验；运行VR应用程序的计算机必须足够强大以处理所有这些信息。直到最近，这种精度和功能才得以以可承受的成本获得（如果有的话）。早期的VR原型花费数万美元，而诸如HTC VIVE和Oculus Rift之类的较新的耳机则以数百美元的价格提供，并且提供了更便宜的解决方案-基于移动设备的解决方案，如Gear VR和Google Cardboard。

trans-unit.source: Some WebGL capabilities depend on the client. Before relying on them, you should use the WebGL getParameter() function to determine what values are supported on the client. Starting in Firefox 10, the webgl.min_capability_mode preference allows simulating minimal values for these capabilities, to test portability.

trans-unit.source: Some browsers implemented an interface called Crypto without having it well defined or being cryptographically sound. In order to avoid confusion, methods and properties of this interface have been removed from browsers implementing the Web Crypto API, and all Web Crypto API methods are available on a new interface: SubtleCrypto. The Crypto.subtle property gives access to an object implementing it.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器实现了一个名为 Crypto 的接口，但没有对其进行很好的定义或加密。为了避免混淆，已从实现Web Crypto API的浏览器中删除了该接口的方法和属性，并且所有Web Crypto API方法都可在新接口 SubtleCrypto 上使用。使用 Crypto.subtle 属性可以访问实现它的对象。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers may re-use touch objects between events, so it's best to copy the bits you care about, rather than referencing the entire object.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器可能会在事件之间重复使用触摸对象,所以最好复制你关心的部分,而不是引用整个对象。

trans-unit.target: 这些方法的某些浏览器实现是 AudioScheduledSourceNode 接口的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers' implementations of this event handler are part of the AudioScheduledSourceNode interface.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器对此事件处理程序的实现是 AudioScheduledSourceNode 接口的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Some codecs and hardware are able to detect when audio begins and ends by watching for "silence" (or relatively low sound levels) to occur. This reduces network bandwidth used for audio by only sending audio data when there's actually something to broadcast. However, in some cases, this is unwanted. For example, in the case of music or other non-voice transmission, this can cause loss of important low-volume sounds. Also, emergency calls should never cut audio when quiet. true (voice activity detection enabled).
trans-unit.target: 一些编解码器和硬件能够通过监视是否出现“静音”（或相对较低的声音水平）来检测音频何时开始和结束。通过仅在实际有广播内容时发送音频数据，从而减少了用于音频的网络带宽。但是，在某些情况下，这是不需要的。例如，在音乐或其他非语音传输的情况下，这可能会导致重要的低音量声音丢失。另外，紧急呼叫在安静时切勿切断音频。 true （启用语音活动检测）。

trans-unit.source: Some devices (mainly mobile devices) can dynamically change the orientation of the screen based on their own orientation, ensuring that the user will always be able to read what's on the screen. While this behavior is perfectly suited for text content, there is some content that can be negatively affected by such a change. For example, games based on the orientation of the device could be messed up by such a change of the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 一些设备(主要是移动设备)可以根据自己的方向动态改变屏幕的方向,确保用户始终能够阅读屏幕上的内容。虽然这种行为完全适用于文本内容,但也有一些内容会因为这种改变而受到负面影响。例如,基于设备方向的游戏可能会因为这样的方向变化而乱了阵脚。

trans-unit.source: Some new features regarding a touch point's touch area - the area of contact between the user and the touch surface - are in the process of being standardized. The new features include the X and Y radius of the ellipse that most closely circumscribes a touch point's contact area with the touch surface. The touch point's rotation angle - the number of degrees of rotation to apply to the described ellipse to align with the contact area - is also be standardized as is the amount of pressure applied to a touch point.
trans-unit.target: 有关触摸点的触摸区域（用户与触摸表面之间的接触区域）的一些新功能正在标准化中。新功能包括椭圆的X和Y半径，该半径最紧密地限制了触摸点与触摸表面的接触区域。触摸点的旋转角度 -施加到所描述的椭圆形以与接触区域对齐的旋转度数-也被标准化，就像施加到触摸点的压力大小一样。

trans-unit.source: Some payment handlers use merchant validation, which is the process of validating the identity of a merchant in some way, usually using some form of cryptographic challenge. If the merchant doesn't successfully validate, it's not allowed to use the payment handler.
trans-unit.target: 一些付款处理程序使用商家验证，即以某种方式验证商家身份的过程，通常使用某种形式的密码质询。如果商家未成功验证，则不允许使用付款处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Some payment handlers use merchant validation, which is the process of validating the identity of a merchant in some way, usually using some form of cryptographic response such as a public key. Validated merchants are allowed to interface with a payment handler.
trans-unit.target: 一些付款处理程序使用商家验证，即以某种方式验证商家身份的过程，通常使用某种形式的密码响应（例如公钥）进行。允许经过验证的商家与付款处理程序进行交互。

The following table provides the values of button and buttons for the various device button states.

trans-unit.source: Some properties allow an empty list in their syntax. In that case, these properties take the none identifier. So, an empty list means that the property has the value none.
trans-unit.target: 某些属性在其语法中允许使用空列表。在这种情况下，这些属性采用 none 标识符。因此，空列表意味着该属性具有值 none 。

trans-unit.source: Some routers using NAT employ a restriction called ‘Symmetric NAT’. This means the router will only accept connections from peers you’ve previously connected to.
trans-unit.target: 一些使用NAT的路由器采用称为“对称NAT”的限制。这意味着路由器将仅接受来自先前连接的对等方的连接。

trans-unit.source: Some routers will have restrictions on who can connect to devices on the network. This can mean that even though we have the public IP address found by the STUN server, not anyone can create a connection. In this situation we need to turn to TURN.
trans-unit.target: 有些路由器会对谁能连接到网络上的设备有限制。这可能意味着,即使我们拥有STUN服务器找到的公共IP地址,也不是任何人都可以创建连接。在这种情况下,我们需要转向TURN。

trans-unit.source: Some specialty keyboard keys (such as the extended keys for controlling media on multimedia keyboards) don't generate key codes on Windows; instead, they trigger WM_APPCOMMAND events. These events get mapped to DOM keyboard events, and are listed among the "Virtual key codes" for Windows, even though they aren't actually key codes.
trans-unit.target: 某些特殊的键盘键（例如用于控制多媒体键盘上的媒体的扩展键）在Windows上不会生成键代码。而是触发 WM_APPCOMMAND 事件。这些事件被映射到DOM键盘事件，并且在Windows的“虚拟键代码”中列出，即使它们实际上不是键代码。

trans-unit.source: Some speech synthesis engines or voices may constrain the minimum and maximum rates further. If SSML is used, this value will be overridden by prosody tags in the markup.
trans-unit.target: 一些语音合成引擎或语音可能会进一步限制最小和最大速率。如果使用SSML，则该值将被标记中的prosody标签覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Some studies have shown that as many as 60% of push notifications are blocked. Allowing your site to push notifications in realtime requires trust. You can build trust by having a well-designed website that provides good content that shows respect for the user, and a clear value to accepting push notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一些研究表明,多达60%的推送通知被阻止。允许你的网站实时推送通知需要信任。你可以通过拥有一个精心设计的网站,提供良好的内容,显示对用户的尊重,以及接受推送通知的明确价值来建立信任。

trans-unit.target: 有时您可能想同时读取两次流。这是通过 ReadableStream.tee() 方法实现的-它输出一个包含原始可读流的两个相同副本的数组，然后可以由两个单独的读取器独立读取它们。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, any value within a range is acceptable for a property's value. You can specify ranges with either or both minimum and maximum values, and you can event specify an ideal value within the range, if you choose. If you provide an ideal value, the browser will try to get as close as possible to matching that value, given the other constraints specified.
trans-unit.target: 有时,一个范围内的任何值都是可以接受的属性值。您可以指定具有最小值和最大值或两者之一的范围,如果您选择的话,您还可以在范围内指定一个理想值。如果您提供了一个理想值,浏览器将在给定的其他约束条件下,尝试尽可能地接近匹配该值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, during the lifetime of a WebRTC session, network conditions change. One of the users might transition from a cellular to a WiFi network, or the network might become congested, for example. When this happens, the ICE agent may choose to perform ICE restart. This is a process by which the network connection is renegotiated, exactly the same way the initial ICE negotiation is performed, with one exception: media continues to flow across the original network connection until the new one is up and running. Then media shifts to the new network connection and the old one is closed.
trans-unit.target: 有时，在WebRTC会话的生存期内，网络状况会发生变化。例如，用户之一可能从蜂窝网络过渡到WiFi网络，或者网络可能变得拥塞。发生这种情况时，ICE代理可以选择执行ICE重新启动。这是重新协商网络连接的过程，与执行初始ICE协商的方式完全相同，但有一个例外：媒体继续在原始网络连接上流动，直到新的网络连接启动并开始运行。然后，介质转移到新的网络连接，而旧的网络连接关闭。

trans-unit.source: Specific usage:
trans-unit.target: 具体用法:

trans-unit.source: Specifically this object will contain all final results that have been returned, followed by the current best hypothesis for all interim results. When subsequent result events are fired, interim results may be overwritten by a newer interim result or by a final result — they may even be removed, if they are at the end of the "results" array and the array length decreases. Final results on the other hand will not be overwritten or removed.
trans-unit.target: 具体来说，此对象将包含所有已返回的最终结果，然后是所有中间结果的当前最佳假设。当触发后续 result 事件时，临时结果可能会被更新的临时结果或最终结果覆盖-如果它们位于“结果”数组的末尾且数组长度减小，则甚至可以删除它们。另一方面，最终结果将不会被覆盖或删除。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a cubic Bézier timing function. The four numbers specify points P1 and P2 of the curve as (x1, y1, x2, y2). Both x values must be in the range [0, 1] or the definition is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定三次贝塞尔定时函数。这四个数字将曲线的点P1和P2指定为（x1，y1，x2，y2）。两个x值都必须在[0，1]范围内，否则定义无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a step timing function, which breaks the animation down into a number of equal time intervals. The browser flips to a different static frame when each interval is reached, rather than animating smoothly. The first parameter specifies the number of intervals in the function. It must be a positive integer (greater than 0). The second parameter, which is optional, specifies the point at which the change of values occur within the interval. If the second parameter is omitted, it is given the value end.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个逐步计时功能，该功能将动画分解为多个相等的时间间隔。当达到每个间隔时，浏览器将切换到不同的静态框架，而不是平滑地进行动画处理。第一个参数指定函数中的间隔数。它必须是一个正整数（大于0）。第二个参数是可选的，它指定在时间间隔内发生值更改的点。如果省略第二个参数，则将其值赋予end。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a 2D texture image in a compressed format.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个压缩格式的2D纹理图像。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a 2D texture sub-image in a compressed format.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a MediaList representing the intended destination medium for style information.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a frames timing function, which breaks the animation down into a number of equal time intervals but also displays the start (0%) and end (100%) states for an equal amount of time to the other intervals. The browser flips to a different static frame when each interval is reached, rather than animating smoothly. See GitHub for a simple example that illustrates the difference between steps() and frames().
trans-unit.target: 指定帧计时功能，该功能可将动画分解为多个相等的时间间隔，并在与其他间隔相等的时间内显示开始（0％）和结束（100％）状态。当达到每个间隔时，浏览器将切换到不同的静态框架，而不是平滑地进行动画处理。请参阅GitHub以获取一个简单的示例，该示例说明了 steps() 和 frames() 之间的区别。

trans-unit.source: Specifies what the origin of targetWindow must be for the event to be dispatched, either as the literal string "*" (indicating no preference) or as a URI. If at the time the event is scheduled to be dispatched the scheme, hostname, or port of targetWindow's document does not match that provided in targetOrigin, the event will not be dispatched; only if all three match will the event be dispatched. This mechanism provides control over where messages are sent; for example, if postMessage() was used to transmit a password, it would be absolutely critical that this argument be a URI whose origin is the same as the intended receiver of the message containing the password, to prevent interception of the password by a malicious third party. Always provide a specific targetOrigin, not *, if you know where the other window's document should be located. Failing to provide a specific target discloses the data you send to any interested malicious site.
trans-unit.target: 以文字字符串 "*" （表示不显示首选项）或URI的形式指定要分派事件的 targetWindow 的原点。如果当时定的事件被调度方案，主机名或端口 targetWindow 的文件不匹配，在提供 targetOrigin ，该事件将不会被派遣;只有所有三个匹配项都将被调度。这种机制可以控制消息的发送位置。例如，如果 postMessage() 用于传输密码，此参数必须是URI（其来源与包含密码的消息的预期接收方相同）是绝对关键的，以防止恶意第三方窃取密码。如果您知道另一个窗口的文档应位于 targetOrigin ，请始终提供特定的targetOrigin，而不是 * 。未能提供特定目标的信息会泄露您发送到任何感兴趣的恶意站点的数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the final URL of a resource
trans-unit.target: 指定资源的最终URL

trans-unit.source: Specifying the range and direction of cursors
trans-unit.target: 指定光标的范围和方向。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the view and projection matrix values to use to render the left eye — this is done using the WebGLRenderingContext.uniformMatrix4fv method, which is passed the location values we retrieved above, and the left matrices obtained from the VRFrameData object.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于渲染左眼的视图和投影矩阵值-这是使用 WebGLRenderingContext.uniformMatrix4fv 方法完成的，该方法传递了我们在上面检索的位置值以及从 VRFrameData 对象获得的左矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the viewport size for the left eye, using WebGLRenderingContext.viewport — this is logically the first half of the canvas width, and the full canvas height.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WebGLRenderingContext.viewport 指定左眼的视口大小-从逻辑上讲，这是画布宽度的前半部分，也是画布的整个高度。

trans-unit.source: Speech
trans-unit.target: Speech

trans-unit.source: Speech input was aborted in some manner, perhaps by some user-agent-specific behavior like a button the user can press to cancel speech input.
trans-unit.target: 语音输入以某种方式中止,也许是通过一些用户代理的特定行为,比如用户可以按下按钮来取消语音输入。

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition
trans-unit.target: 语音识别

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition involves receiving speech through a device's microphone, which is then checked by a speech recognition service against a list of grammar (basically, the vocabulary you want to have recognised in a particular app.) When a word or phrase is successfully recognised, it is returned as a result (or list of results) as a text string, and further actions can be initiated as a result.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别包括通过设备的麦克风接收语音,然后由语音识别服务根据语法列表(基本上是您希望在特定应用程序中识别的词汇)进行检查。 当一个单词或短语被成功识别时,它将作为结果(或结果列表)以文本字符串的形式返回,并可作为结果启动进一步的操作。

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition is accessed via the SpeechRecognition interface, which provides the ability to recognize voice context from an audio input (normally via the device's default speech recognition service) and respond appropriately. Generally you'll use the interface's constructor to create a new SpeechRecognition object, which has a number of event handlers available for detecting when speech is input through the device's microphone. The SpeechGrammar interface represents a container for a particular set of grammar that your app should recognise. Grammar is defined using JSpeech Grammar Format (JSGF.)
trans-unit.target: 语音识别是通过 SpeechRecognition 接口访问的，该接口提供了从音频输入中识别语音上下文的功能（通常是通过设备的默认语音识别服务）并做出适当的响应。通常，您将使用接口的构造函数创建一个新的 SpeechRecognition 对象，该对象具有许多事件处理程序，可用于检测何时通过设备的麦克风输入语音。该 SpeechGrammar 接口代表了一组特定的语法，你的应用程序应该认识到的容器。语法是使用JSpeech语法格式（JSGF）定义的。

trans-unit.source: Speech synthesis
trans-unit.target: 语音合成

trans-unit.source: Speech synthesis (aka text-to-speech, or tts) involves receiving synthesising text contained within an app to speech, and playing it out of a device's speaker or audio output connection.
trans-unit.target: 语音合成(又称文本到语音,或tts)涉及到接收将应用程序中包含的文本合成为语音,并将其从设备的扬声器或音频输出连接中播放出来。

trans-unit.source: Speech synthesis is accessed via the SpeechSynthesis interface, a text-to-speech component that allows programs to read out their text content (normally via the device's default speech synthesiser.) Different voice types are represented by SpeechSynthesisVoice objects, and different parts of text that you want to be spoken are represented by SpeechSynthesisUtterance objects. You can get these spoken by passing them to the SpeechSynthesis.speak() method.
trans-unit.target: 语音合成是通过 SpeechSynthesis 接口访问的，该接口是一个文本到语音的组件，允许程序读出其文本内容（通常是通过设备的默认语音合成器进行的。）不同的语音类型由 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象表示，文本的不同部分您想说的是由 SpeechSynthesisUtterance 对象表示的。您可以通过将它们传递给 SpeechSynthesis.speak() 方法来获得口语。

trans-unit.source: Standard - RFC 6455 Support
trans-unit.target: 标准-RFC 6455 支持

trans-unit.source: Standard notch filter, also called a band-stop or band-rejection filter. It is the opposite of a bandpass filter: frequencies outside the give range of frequencies pass through; frequencies inside it are attenuated.
trans-unit.target: 标准陷波滤波器，也称为带阻或带阻滤波器。与带通滤波器相反：超出给定频率范围的频率通过；内部的频率被衰减。

trans-unit.source: Standard WebGL 1 constants
trans-unit.target: 标准WebGL 1常量

trans-unit.target: 标准WebGL 2常量

trans-unit.source: Standard WebGL constants are installed on the WebGLRenderingContext and WebGL2RenderingContext objects, so that you use them as gl.CONSTANT_NAME:
trans-unit.target: 标准WebGL常量安装在 WebGLRenderingContext 和 WebGL2RenderingContext 对象上，以便将它们用作 gl.CONSTANT_NAME ：

trans-unit.target: 标准事件对象

trans-unit.target: 所有媒体类型都包含标准字段

trans-unit.target: 标准 SpeechGrammar 允许使用数组语法从 SpeechGrammarList 中检索单个SpeechGrammar对象。

trans-unit.target: 标准接口

trans-unit.target: 标准属性

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order allpass filter. It Lets all frequencies through, but changes the phase-relationship between the various frequencies.
trans-unit.target: 标准二阶全通滤波器。它允许所有频率通过，但会更改各个频率之间的相位关系。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order allpass filter. It lets all frequencies through, but changes the phase-relationship between the various frequencies.
trans-unit.target: 标准二阶全通滤波器。它允许所有频率通过，但会更改各个频率之间的相位关系。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order bandpass filter. Frequencies outside the given range of frequencies are attenuated; the frequencies inside it pass through.
trans-unit.target: 标准二阶带通滤波器。在给定的频率范围外的频率被衰减,其内的频率通过。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order highshelf filer. Frequencies higher than the frequency get a boost or an attenuation; frequencies lower than it are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标准的二阶高阶滤波器。比频率高的频率得到提升或衰减,比它低的频率不变。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order highshelf filter. Frequencies higher than the frequency get a boost or an attenuation; frequencies lower than it are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标准的二阶高阻滤波器。比频率高的频率得到提升或衰减,比它低的频率不变。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order lowshelf filer. Frequencies lower than the frequency get a boost, or an attenuation; frequencies over it are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标准的二阶低频滤波器。低于频率的频率得到提升,或衰减,超过频率的频率不变。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order lowshelf filter. Frequencies lower than the frequency get a boost, or an attenuation; frequencies over it are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标准的二阶低架滤波器。低于频率的频率得到提升,或衰减;超过频率的频率不变。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order resonant highpass filter with 12dB/octave rolloff. Frequencies below the cutoff are attenuated; frequencies above it pass through.
trans-unit.target: 标准二阶谐振高通滤波器,12dB/倍频程滚落。低于截止值的频率被衰减,高于截止值的频率则被通过。

trans-unit.source: Standard second-order resonant lowpass filter with 12dB/octave rolloff. Frequencies below the cutoff pass through; frequencies above it are attenuated.
trans-unit.target: 标准二阶谐振低通滤波器,12dB/倍频程滚落。低于截止值的频率通过,高于截止值的频率被衰减。

trans-unit.source: Standard serializer — returns a JSON representation of the subscription properties.

trans-unit.source: Starting from Firefox 49, empty headers are returned as empty strings in case the preference network.http.keep_empty_response_headers_as_empty_string is set to true, defaulting to false. Before Firefox 49 empty headers had been ignored. Since Firefox 50 the preference defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 49开始，如果首选项 network.http.keep_empty_response_headers_as_empty_string 设置为 true ，则默认为 false ，以空字符串形式返回空标题。在Firefox 49之前，空标题已被忽略。从Firefox 50开始，默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Starting from Gecko 6.0 (Firefox 6.0 / Thunderbird 6.0 / SeaMonkey 2.3), privileged code (such as extensions) can pass an nsIFile object to the DOM File constructor to specify the file to reference.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 6.0（Firefox 6.0 / Thunderbird 6.0 / SeaMonkey 2.3）开始，特权代码（例如扩展名）可以将 nsIFile 对象传递给DOM File 构造函数，以指定要引用的文件。

trans-unit.source: Starting from Gecko 8.0 (Firefox 8.0 / Thunderbird 8.0 / SeaMonkey 2.5), you can use new File to create File objects from XPCOM component code instead of having to instantiate the nsIDOMFile object directly. The constructor takes, in contrast to Blob, as second argument the filename. The filename can be any String.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 8.0（Firefox 8.0 / Thunderbird 8.0 / SeaMonkey 2.5）开始，您可以使用 new File 通过XPCOM组件代码创建 File 对象，而不必直接实例化 nsIDOMFile 对象。与 Blob 相反，构造函数将filename作为第二个参数。文件名可以是任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Chrome 49, notifications do not work in incognito mode.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 49开始,通知不能在隐身模式下工作。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Chrome 52, the members of this interface were moved to URL
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 52开始，此界面的成员已移至URL

trans-unit.source: Starting in Chrome 52, this property was moved to URL
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 52开始，此属性已移至URL

trans-unit.source: Starting in Chrome 56, channelCountMode is set to explicit and channelCount is fixed to the number of outputs, as per the latest spec.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 56开始，根据最新规范， channelCountMode 设置为 explicit 而 channelCount 固定为输出数。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Chrome 59, this method cannot send a Blob whose type is not CORS safelisted. This is a temporary change until a mitigation can be found for the security issues that this creates. For more information see Chrome bug 720283.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 59开始，此方法无法发送其类型不在CORS安全列表中的 Blob 。这是一个临时更改，直到可以缓解由此造成的安全问题。有关更多信息，请参阅Chrome错误720283。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 13, null is always returned instead of the empty string, as per the DOM4 specification. Previously, there were cases in which an empty string could be returned.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 13开始，根据DOM4规范，始终返回 null 而不是空字符串。以前，在某些情况下可以返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 14, using MozBlobBuilder will show a warning message in the web console that the use of MozBlobBuilder is deprecated and suggests to use Blob constructor instead.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 14开始，使用 MozBlobBuilder 将在Web控制台中显示一条警告消息， MozBlobBuilder 已弃用MozBlobBuilder，并建议改用 Blob 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 15.0, this method is a no-op and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 15.0开始,这个方法是没有操作的,没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 30, synchronous requests on the main thread have been deprecated due to their negative impact on performance and the user experience. Therefore, the async parameter may not be false except in a Worker.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 30开始，不赞成在主线程上执行同步请求，因为它们会对性能和用户体验产生负面影响。因此，除了在 Worker 中， async 参数不得为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 36, attributeOldValue has no default value; previously, its default value was false.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 36开始， attributeOldValue 没有默认值。以前，其默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 36, attributes has no default value; previously, its default value was false.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 36开始， attributes 没有默认值。以前，其默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 36, characterData has no default value; previously, its default value was false.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 36开始， characterData 没有默认值。以前，其默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 36, characterDataOldValue has no default value; previously, its default value was false.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 36开始， characterDataOldValue 没有默认值。以前，其默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 46.0.1, Window.close() can no longer close windows that weren't opened by the same script. This is a security precaution.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 46.0.1开始， Window.close() 无法再关闭同一脚本未打开的窗口。这是安全预防措施。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 5.0 this property's value is based on the value of the Accept-LanguageHTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 5.0开始，此属性的值基于 Accept-Language HTTP标头的值。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 55, if neither audioCapabilities nor videoCapabilities is specified in supportedConfigurations, a warning is output to the web console.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 55开始，如果没有 audioCapabilities 也不 videoCapabilities 中指定 supportedConfigurations ，警告输出到Web控制台。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Firefox 6, this property is read only, as defined by the standard.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 6开始,这个属性由标准定义为只读。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 10.0 (Firefox 10.0 / Thunderbird 10.0 / SeaMonkey 2.7), non-finite values to any of these parameters cause the call to putImageData() to be silently ignored, rather than throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 10.0（Firefox 10.0 / Thunderbird 10.0 / SeaMonkey 2.7）开始，对这些参数中任何一个的非限定值都会导致对 putImageData() 的调用被静默忽略，而不是引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 11.0, the WebSocket API is no longer prefixed.
trans-unit.target: 从 Gecko 11.0 开始,WebSocket API 不再有前缀。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 2.0 (Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1), you can hide the admittedly ugly file <input> element and present your own interface for opening the file picker and displaying which file or files the user has selected. You can do this by styling the input element with display:none and calling the click() method on the <input> element.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 2.0（Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1）开始，您可以隐藏难看的文件 <input> 元素，并提供自己的界面来打开文件选择器并显示用户选择的文件。您可以通过使用 display:none 设置输入元素的样式并在 <input> 元素上调用 click() 方法来实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 5.0 (Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2), intervals are clamped to fire no more often than once per second in inactive tabs.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 5.0 (Firefox 5.0/Thunderbird 5.0/SeaMonkey 2.2)开始,在非活动标签页中,间隔时间被限制在每秒不超过一次。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 7.0 (Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4), the network.websocket.max-connections preference is used to determine the maximum number of WebSocket connections that can be open at a time. The default value is 200.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 7.0（Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4）开始， network.websocket.max-connections 首选项用于确定一次可以打开的最大WebSocket连接数。默认值为200。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Gecko 8.0 (Firefox 8.0 / Thunderbird 8.0 / SeaMonkey 2.5), the deflate-stream extension to the WebSocket protocol has been disabled, since it's been deprecated from the specification drafts. This resolves incompatibilities with some sites.
trans-unit.target: 从 Gecko 8.0 (Firefox 8.0/Thunderbird 8.0/SeaMonkey 2.5)开始,WebSocket 协议的放气流扩展已被禁用,因为它已从规范草案中废弃。这解决了与某些网站不兼容的问题。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Opera 43, channelCountMode is set to explicit and channelCount is fixed to the number of outputs, as per the latest spec.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 43开始，根据最新规范，将 channelCountMode 设置为 explicit 并将 channelCount 固定为输出数量。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Opera 46, this method cannot send a Blob whose type is not CORS safelisted. This is a temporary change until a mitigation can be found for the security issues that this creates. For more information see Chrome bug 720283.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 46开始，此方法无法发送其类型不在CORS安全列表中的 Blob 。这是一个临时更改，直到可以缓解由此造成的安全问题。有关更多信息，请参阅Chrome错误720283。

trans-unit.source: Starting in version 56, channelCountMode is set to explicit and channelCount is fixed to the number of outputs, as per the latest spec.
trans-unit.target: 从版本56开始，根据最新规范， channelCountMode 设置为 explicit 而 channelCount 固定为输出数。

trans-unit.source: Starting in version 60, the timestamp is correctly computed based on the window's Performance time, rather than Date.getTime().
trans-unit.target: 从版本60开始， timestamp 是根据窗口的“ Performance ”时间而不是 Date.getTime() 正确计算的。

trans-unit.target: 开始媒体录制

trans-unit.target: 创业

trans-unit.source: Starting with (Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2), drawImage() handles negative arguments in accordance with the specification, by flipping the rectangle around the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 从（Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2）开始， drawImage() 根据规范，通过围绕适当的轴翻转矩形来处理负参数。

trans-unit.source: Starting with (Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2):
trans-unit.target: 从(Firefox 5.0/Thunderbird 5.0/SeaMonkey 2.2)开始。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46 this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless its sandbox attribute has the value allow-modal.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性的值为 allow-modal ,否则将禁止该方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46, this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless its sandbox attribute has the value allow-modals.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性具有值 allow-modals ,否则该方法将被阻止在<iframe> 中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46, update() returns a promise that resolves with 'undefined' if the operation completed successfully or there was no update, and rejects if update failed. If the new worker ran but installation failed, the promise still resolves. Formerly, it raised an exception.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46开始,update()返回一个承诺,如果操作成功完成或没有更新,则用'undefined'来解析,如果更新失败则拒绝。如果新的工作者运行了,但安装失败,承诺仍然会解析。以前,它会引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46.0 this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless it sandbox attribute has the value allow-modal.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46.0开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性的值为 allow-modal ,否则将禁止该方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46.0 this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless its sandbox attribute has the value allow-modals.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46.0开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性具有值 allow-modals ,否则该方法将被阻止在<iframe>中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 46.0 this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless its sandbox attribute has the value allow-modals.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 46.0开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性具有值 allow-modals ,否则该方法将被阻止在<iframe>中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 49, Firefox 54 and Opera 36, this property returns DOMHighResTimeStamp instead of DOMTimeStamp.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 49，Firefox 54和Opera 36开始，此属性返回 DOMHighResTimeStamp 而不是 DOMTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 53 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 53和Opera 40开始,不受信任的事件不会调用默认操作。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 58 and Opera 45, setting this property to false does nothing, as per spec discussion.
trans-unit.target: 根据规范讨论，从Chrome 58和Opera 45开始，将此属性设置为false不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Chrome 58, this interface can no longer be called as a function.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 58开始,这个接口不能再作为函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Firefox 11, it's no longer supported to use the withCredentials attribute when performing synchronous requests. Attempting to do so throws an NS_ERROR_DOM_INVALID_ACCESS_ERR exception.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 11开始，在执行同步请求时不再支持使用 withCredentials 属性。尝试这样做会引发 NS_ERROR_DOM_INVALID_ACCESS_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Firefox 13, the Range object throws a DOMException as defined in DOM 4, instead of a RangeException defined in prior specifications.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 13开始， Range 对象将引发DOM 4中定义的 DOMException ，而不是先前规范中定义的 RangeException 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Firefox 2, a better mechanism for client-side storage is available - WHATWG DOM Storage.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 2开始，可以使用一种更好的客户端存储机制-WHATWG DOM Storage。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Firefox 20, the index argument has been made optional and defaults to -1 as per HTML specification.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 20开始,索引参数已成为可选的,并根据HTML规范默认为-1。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Firefox 3, secondary windows are always resizable (bug 177838)
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 3开始，辅助窗口始终可调整大小（错误177838）

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 1.9, this method is subject to the same same-origin policy as other properties, and does not work if doing so would change the document's origin.
trans-unit.target: 从 Gecko 1.9 开始,该方法与其他属性一样,受制于同源策略,如果这样做会改变文档的来源,则无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 1.9.2, document.open() uses the principal of the document whose URI it uses, instead of fetching the principal off the stack. As a result, you can no longer call document.write() into an untrusted document from chrome, even using wrappedJSObject.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 1.9.2开始， document.open() 使用其URI使用的文档主体，而不是从堆栈中获取主体。结果，即使使用 wrappedJSObject ，也无法再从chrome 调用 document.write() 到不受信任的文档中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 10.0 (Firefox 10.0 / Thunderbird 10.0 / SeaMonkey 2.7), there are two preferences available which let you control the capabilities of WebGL for testing purposes:
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 10.0 (Firefox 10.0/Thunderbird 10.0/SeaMonkey 2.7)开始,有两个可用的偏好设置,可以让您控制WebGL的功能进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 16.0 (Firefox 16.0 / Thunderbird 16.0 / SeaMonkey 2.13), specifying null for the repetition parameter is now allowed and results in the repetition being set to "repeat" (bug 762657).
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 16.0（Firefox 16.0 / Thunderbird 16.0 / SeaMonkey 2.13）开始，现在允许为 repetition 参数指定 null ，并且导致重复设置为 "repeat" （错误762657）。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 19.0 (Firefox 19.0 / Thunderbird 19.0 / SeaMonkey 2.16) the hasFeature method will always return true.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 19.0（Firefox 19.0 / Thunderbird 19.0 / SeaMonkey 2.16）开始， hasFeature 方法将始终返回true。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 2.0 (Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1), specifying non-finite values now throws NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR instead of SYNTAX_ERR.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 2.0（Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1）开始，现在指定非限定值将引发 NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR 而不是 SYNTAX_ERR 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 2.0 (Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1):
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 2.0开始(Firefox 4/Thunderbird 3.3/SeaMonkey 2.1)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 5.0 (Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2), specifying a null or undefined image correctly throws a TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR exception.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 5.0（Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2）开始，正确指定 null 或 undefined 图像会引发 TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 5.0 (Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2), specifying a negative radius correctly throws INDEX_SIZE_ERR.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 5.0（Firefox 5.0 / Thunderbird 5.0 / SeaMonkey 2.2）开始，正确指定负半径会抛出 INDEX_SIZE_ERR 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 5.0, specifying invalid values for globalAlpha no longer throws a SYNTAX_ERR exception; these are now correctly silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 5.0开始，为 globalAlpha 指定无效值不再引发 SYNTAX_ERR 异常；现在可以正确地无声忽略这些。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 7.0 (Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4), the non-standard and deprecated property mozDash has been implemented to set and get a dash list. This property will be deprecated and removed in the future, see bug 931389. Use getLineDash() instead.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 7.0（Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4）开始，已实现了非标准且已弃用的属性 mozDash 来设置和获取破折号列表。以后将不建议使用此属性并将其删除，请参见bug 931389。使用 getLineDash() 代替。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 7.0 (Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4), the non-standard and deprecated property mozDash has been implemented to set and get a dash list. This property will be deprecated and removed in the future, see bug 931389. Use setLineDash() instead.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 7.0（Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4）开始，已实现了非标准且已弃用的属性 mozDash 来设置和获取破折号列表。以后将不建议使用此属性并将其删除，请参见bug 931389。使用 setLineDash() 代替。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Gecko 7.0 (Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4), the non-standard and deprecated property mozDashOffset has been implemented. This property will be deprecated and removed in the future, see bug 931389. Use lineDashOffset instead.
trans-unit.target: 从Gecko 7.0（Firefox 7.0 / Thunderbird 7.0 / SeaMonkey 2.4）开始，已实现了非标准且已弃用的属性 mozDashOffset 。以后将不建议使用此属性并将其删除，请参见bug 931389。请改用 lineDashOffset 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Opera 33, update() returns a promise that resolves with 'undefined' if the operation completed successfully or there was no update, and rejects if update failed. If the new worker ran but installation failed, the promise still resolves. Formerly, it raised an exception.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 33开始,update()返回一个承诺,如果操作成功完成或没有更新,则用'undefined'解析,如果更新失败,则拒绝。如果新的工作者运行了,但安装失败了,承诺仍然会解析。以前,它会引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Opera 45, this interface can no longer be called as a function.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 45开始,这个接口不能再以函数的形式被调用。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Opera 53, this method is blocked inside an <iframe> unless its sandbox attribute has the value allow-modals.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 53开始，除非 <iframe> 的沙箱属性的值为 allow-modals ,否则将禁止该方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with some variables
trans-unit.target: 从一些变量开始

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 49, this property returns DOMHighResTimeStamp instead of DOMTimeStamp.
trans-unit.target: 从版本49开始，此属性返回 DOMHighResTimeStamp 而不是 DOMTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 53, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.
trans-unit.target: 从53版本开始,不受信任的事件不会调用默认操作。

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 59 this property is no longer required to always return 24.
trans-unit.target: 从59版本开始,这个属性不再需要总是返回24。

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 59, method parameters are required instead of optional.
trans-unit.target: 从版本59开始,方法参数是必需的,而不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Starts a timer with a name specified as an input parameter. Up to 10,000 simultaneous timers can run on a given page.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定为输入参数的名称启动计时器。给定页面上最多可以同时运行10,000个计时器。

trans-unit.source: Starts a new path by emptying the list of sub-paths. Call this method when you want to create a new path.
trans-unit.target: 通过清空子路径列表来启动一个新路径。当你想创建一个新的路径时,调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: Starts a timer you can use to track how long an operation takes. You give each timer a unique name, and may have up to 10,000 timers running on a given page. When you call console.timeEnd() with the same name, the browser will output the time, in milliseconds, that elapsed since the timer was started.
trans-unit.target: 启动一个计时器，您可以使用该计时器来跟踪操作需要多长时间。您为每个计时器指定一个唯一的名称，并且在给定页面上最多可以运行10,000个计时器。当您使用相同的名称调用 console.timeEnd() 时，浏览器将输出自计时器启动以来经过的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Starts a transform feedback operation.
trans-unit.target: 启动变换反馈操作。

trans-unit.source: Starts or resumes playing of an animation, or begins the animation again if it previously finished.
trans-unit.target: 开始或恢复播放一个动画,如果之前已经结束,则重新开始播放。

trans-unit.source: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains a data: URL representing the file's data.
trans-unit.target: 开始读取指定 Blob 的内容，完成后， result 属性包含一个 data: 表示文件数据的URL。

trans-unit.source: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains an ArrayBuffer representing the file's data.
trans-unit.target: 开始读取指定 Blob 的内容，完成后， result 属性包含一个表示文件数据的 ArrayBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the contents of the file as a text string.
trans-unit.target: 开始读取指定 Blob 的内容，完成后， result 属性以文本字符串形式包含文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the raw binary data from the file as a string.
trans-unit.target: 开始读取指定 Blob 的内容，完成后， result 属性将包含来自文件的原始二进制数据作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Starts recording a performance profile (for example, the Firefox performance tool).
trans-unit.target: 开始记录性能配置文件（例如Firefox性能工具）。

trans-unit.source: Starts rendering the audio, taking into account the current connections and the current scheduled changes. This page covers both the event-based version and the promise-based version.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到当前的连接和当前的计划变更,开始渲染音频。本页包括基于事件的版本和基于承诺的版本。

trans-unit.source: Starts repeatedly executing the function specified by function every delay milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 每隔 delay 毫秒开始重复执行功能指定的 function 。

trans-unit.source: Starts scrolling of the marquee.
trans-unit.target: 开始滚动字幕。

trans-unit.source: Starts the VRDisplay presenting a scene.
trans-unit.target: 启动 VRDisplay 呈现场景。

trans-unit.source: Starts the asynchronous process of unsubscribing from the push service, returning a Promise that resolves to a Boolean when the current subscription is successfully unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 启动取消订阅服务的异步过程，返回一个 Promise ，当成功取消注册当前订阅时，该Promise会解析为 Boolean 。

trans-unit.source: Starts the browser's built-in profiler (for example, the Firefox performance tool). You can specify an optional name for the profile.
trans-unit.target: 启动浏览器的内置事件探查器（例如Firefox性能工具）。您可以为配置文件指定一个可选名称。

trans-unit.source: Starts the daemon forward (index of each invocation increasing) or backwards (index decreasing).
trans-unit.target: 向后（每次调用的索引增加）或向后（索引减少）启动守护程序。

trans-unit.source: Starts the process of asynchronously appending the specified buffer to the SourceBuffer. Returns a Promise which is fulfilled once the buffer has been appended.
trans-unit.target: 开始将指定缓冲区异步附加到 SourceBuffer 的过程。返回一个 Promise ，一旦添加了缓冲区，该Promise就会实现。

trans-unit.source: Starts the process of asynchronously removing media segments in the specified range from the SourceBuffer. Returns a Promise which is fulfilled once all matching segments have been removed.
trans-unit.target: 开始从 SourceBuffer 异步删除指定范围内的媒体段的过程。返回一个 Promise ，一旦所有匹配的句段都被删除，它就会实现。

trans-unit.source: Starts the process of fetching a resource from the network.
trans-unit.target: 开始从网络中获取资源的过程。

trans-unit.source: Starts the process of fetching a resource. This returns a promise that resolves to the Response object representing the response to your request. This algorithm is the entry point for the fetch handling handed to the service worker context.
trans-unit.target: 开始获取资源的过程。这将返回一个承诺，该承诺将解析为代表对您的请求的响应的 Response 对象。该算法是传递给服务工作者上下文的获取处理的入口点。

trans-unit.source: Starts the recording process by calling recorder.start(), and outputs a message to the log with the updated state of the recorder and the number of seconds it will be recording.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 recorder.start() 开始记录过程，并向记录器输出一条消息，记录器的状态已更新，并记录了记录的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Starts the sending of messages queued on the port (only needed when using EventTarget.addEventListener; it is implied when using MessagePort.onmessage.)
trans-unit.target: 开始发送在端口上排队的消息（仅在使用 EventTarget.addEventListener 时才需要；在使用 MessagePort.onmessage 时暗含）。

trans-unit.source: Stencilling enables and disables drawing on a per-pixel basis. It is typically used in multipass rendering to achieve special effects.
trans-unit.target: 模板画可以按每个像素来启用和禁用绘图。它通常用于多通道渲染以实现特殊效果。
